ItemTooltips.ghost: If the enemy team got strong right clicker and not much magical damage nuke the ghost scepter is aver good choice.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: If you laning on the safe lane and your team go already a stack of wards and courier you should buy sentry wards to deward the pullcamp, so your lane get the exp and gold advantage.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: If u more like Force Staff u can instead of the euls go for it.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: If your team need the extra oushing power and you got the gold, refresher orb and aghanims are the right choices.
ItemTooltips.refresher: If your team need the extra oushing power and you got the gold, refresher orb and aghanims are the right choices.

AbilityTooltips.shadow_shaman_ether_shock: A very powerful nuke to harass the enemys in laning phase and in teamfights.
AbilityTooltips.shadow_shaman_voodoo: very good disable if u dont have the position for a shakle use it or for ward trapping enemys. Note, that the enemy wont be slowed if he has haste anctivated
AbilityTooltips.shadow_shaman_shackles: Very long disable but u need a good position in teamfight to dont get interrupted.
AbilityTooltips.shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward: nice skill to push towers, less effective in teamfights but if u can hold the enemys in place its also very good in teamfights.
